body.p:
Frankfort Ky July 29th 1861
To His Honor B MaGoffin
Z Harrison was Sent to the Penitentiary for 8 years for Horse Stealing form Union County Feb term 1855 was Red Feb 16th 1855.

South & Bowen Promised him when He got the cell Building done. (He is a Stone cutter by trade) they would Intercede in his behalf for a Pardon. He is done his part of the work. They South & Bowen Says If you feel dispose to Pardon him they have no objections, there fore I would Recom
^mend^ his Pardon. If you Pardon him date it for the 30 which is to morrow which will give me time to fix up his clothes
